entries.name: Wings
entries: When a Large or smaller creature enters your reach with this weapon, you can use your reaction to force it to make a contested Strength (Athletics) check against you. If you succeed, the creature takes the weapon's normal damage, is stopped 5 ft. away from you and its speed becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.

item.name: Cloak of the Cozy North
entries: This dark velvet cloak with thick sable fur around the collar with old golden clasps with runic designs attached together with a chain has the following properties:

items.entry: It constitutes {@item clothing, cold weather|IDRotF|cold weather gear}
Once per day you may drape it over a willing creature, or hug a willing creature while wearing it, and cast {@spell calm emotions|PHB} on them

item.name: Box of Refrigeration
entries: This small rectangular box is slightly cold to the touch and always appears to have condensation on its exterior.
It has dimensions of 30x20x10cm.
Any object or creature fully within the volume for more than 1 minute has its temperature magically set to exactly 5 degrees Celsius.
Upon partially or fully leaving the volume of the box the objects' or creatures' temperature returns to its original temperature.

item.name: Boots of Puddle Immunity
entries: While wearing these fine boots your clothing is immune to non-magical dirt originating from the surface you are on.
Once per day you may cast {@spell puddle walk|Tyms}.

item.name: Wand of Canned SoundBites
entries: This wand holds 5 charges, regaining all charges at dawn. While holding the wand you gain access to the following:

entries.name: Replay (1 charge)
entries: Choose a point within 60ft. A sound emanates from a 10ft sphere centered at the point. You may choose of one of the precanned audience reaction sounds:

items.entry: Or if you have previously used the Record ability, you may replay that sound.

entries.name: Record (2 charges)
entries: As an Action you record a short sound (6 seconds or up to 10 words). The sound is stored in the wand and can be Replayed. If you use this action again the saved sound is lost and replaced by the new one.

item.name: Casoronan Flask
entries: This small ceramic flask appears to be able to hold a half a pint of liquid and weighs half a pound. Sloshing sounds can be heard from within the flask when it is shaken, even if the flask is empty.
You can use an action and name one liquid from the table below to cause the flask to produce the chosen liquid. The maximum amount of liquid the jug can produce depends on the liquid you named.
Once the flask has produced its maximum amount of a certain type of liquid, it cannot produce any more of that liquid until the next dawn.

item.name: Scrunchy of Hair Taming
entries: This Scrunchy has the colour and shape perfectly fitting your hair.
This item has 3 charges, which regenerate at dawn. While worn in the hair you gain access to the following:

entries.name: Tame Hair (no cost)
entries: As an action you can command the Scunchy yo change your hairstyle (it however does not adjust colour or length).

entries.name: Dye (1 charge)
entries: As an action command the Scrunchy to change the colour of your hair. The effect lasts for 8 hours or until dismissed.

entries.name: Hair of Billowing (2 charges)
entries: As an action command the Scrunchy to let your hair flow wild. For 1 minute or until dismissed your hair appears to be hit by the wind in a perfectly flattering way. While this is active you have +2 to Charisma saving throws, and {@skill Persuasion} and {@skill Deception} checks.

item.name: Assassin's Blade
entries: This well made dagger is lighter than normal and has intricate lines carved in it leading from a divot in the hilt to the blade and point. A thin-glass bead of poison slots into the divot and when squeezed brakes and the poison flows through the channels towards the blade and point, coating them in poison.

Using your object interaction you can break the poison bead to coat the blade for 1 hour. When the blade is coated with the poison, when you hit a creature they must succeed a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 2d6} poison damage and become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. On a successful save the creature takes half the damage and is not poisoned.

item.name: Doppler Shard
entries: A crystallised remnant of a Doppler's true form, looks like amber.
Allows you to cast {@spell disguise self|phb} for free without verbal or somatic components once per day (resetting at dawn).

item.name: +1 Brawler's Armbands
entries: While you're wearing these armbands, your unarmed strikes and attacks with improvised weapons are considered magical for the purpose of overcoming immunity and resistance to nonmagical attacks and damage, and you gain a +1 bonus to the attack and damage rolls of your unarmed strikes and attacks with improvised weapons.

item.name: +2 Brawler's Armbands
entries: While you're wearing these armbands, your unarmed strikes and attacks with improvised weapons are considered magical for the purpose of overcoming immunity and resistance to nonmagical attacks and damage, and you gain a +2 bonus to the attack and damage rolls of your unarmed strikes and attacks with improvised weapons.

item.name: +3 Brawler's Armbands
entries: While you're wearing these armbands, your unarmed strikes and attacks with improvised weapons are considered magical for the purpose of overcoming immunity and resistance to nonmagical attacks and damage, and you gain a +3 bonus to the attack and damage rolls of your unarmed strikes and attacks with improvised weapons.

item.name: Ember Bells
entries: A set of bells, glowing slightly as if they were very hot, yet the heat is negligible.
Sheds dim light in a 5ft radius.
Holds 4 charges, while attuned you can do the following:

items.entry: As an action you can expend 1 charge to cast {@spell toll the dead|xge}, the sound of the bell acts as a Verbal, and its movement as a Somatic component.

entries: As an action you can expend 2 charges to cast {@spell for whom the bell tolls}, the sound of the bell acts as a Verbal, and its movement as a Somatic component.
By expending additional charges you can activate the following additional effects:

items.entry: By expending one additional charge, you can cast this spell as a bonus action.
By expending one additional charge, you have advantage on your next attack roll against the creature identified as closest to death.

By expending one additional charge, you can force the creature to make a Charisma saving throw against your spell save DC. Upon failure they become {@condition frightened} of you for 1 minute. They may attempt the saving throw again at the end of their turn, ending the condition on a success.

entries: The bells regain {@dice 1d4} charges at dawn.

item.name: Hexdeck
entries: A deck of high-quality playing cards which shimmer slightly.
The deck has 4 charges. While holding it you can use the following features:

entries.name: Card Throw (1-2 charges)
entries: As an action you can expend 1 charge to make a ranged spell attack using your Dexterity as the spellcasting ability. The throw has a range of 60 ft and deals {@damage 1d8} force damage on a hit.
You may spend an additional charge to perform this as a bonus action.

entries.name: Card Spray (2-4 charges)
entries: As an action you can spend 2 charges to cast {@spell spray of cards} as a 2nd level spell, using your Dexterity as the spellcasting ability.
You may expend additional charges to increase the level of the spell. The level increases by 1 for each additional charge spent.

entries.name: Sleeved Ace (1-2 charges)
entries: As a bonus action you can expend 1 charge to attack a spectral ace from your sleeve to an object you are holding. The next attack you land with this object within 1 minute deals an additional {@damage 2d4} force damage.

If a minute passes without landing a hit, or if the object takes any damage the object explodes in a 5 ft radius. Any creature within the radius must succeed a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d6} force damage. On a successful save, they take half as much damage.
You may expend an additional charge to make the card invisible.

entries.name: Charging
entries: If the last charge is expended the deck becomes inert, losing its shimmer and behaving like a mundane (but well made) deck of cards.
If the deck is not inert, it regains {@dice 1d4} charges at dawn.
You have acess to the {@spell pretidigitation} cantrip as long as the deck is not inert.

entries.name: Recharging an Inert Deck
entries: The deck remains inert until its attuned user wins a game of chance, at which point it regains 1 charge immediately and is no longer inert.

item.name: Flintlock Pistol
entries: The smallest gunpowder weapon (thought) possible, due to cumbersome loading, it is usually used in rank fire or at the beginning of combat, and then discarded, favoured by seamen for their easy handling and high alpha-damage.
If already drawn, the pistol can be fired as a bonus action.
This weapon can be fired as part of a reaction, provided the reaction is to make an attack.

spell.name: Puddle Walk
entries: This spell grants the ability to move across water no deeper than three inches as if it were harmless solid ground.
If you target a creature submerged no deeper than three inches in water, the spell carries the target to the surface of the water at a rate of 60 feet per round.

spell.name: For Whom the Bell Tolls
entries: You make the sound of a bell. Of all creatures within 120 feet who can hear the sound you learn which one is closest to death. (can be lowest HP, oldest age, worst illness, DMs discretion).

reward.name: Blessing of Kord
entries: This blessing allows you to add {@dice 1d4} to an attack roll, ability check or saving throw once.

entries.name: Loading
entries: This weapon can be fired at most once before reloading.
As an action, you can load gunpower and a wad. From this upon firing the firearm will fire a 'blank'.
Once loaded with gunpowder, as an action you can load a {@item ball bearing|PHB}. (After this you can fire the firearm with a bonus action as normal).

entries.name: Short Barrel
entries: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on your ranged attack rolls with this weapon.

entries.name: Armour Piercing
entries: This weapon interacts differently than normal with armour:
If the roll to hit was above the target's base AC but below their AC with armour, the damage is still applied, but reduced by the difference between armoured and unarmoured AC.

entries.name: Misfires
entries: If an attack roll made with this weapon is a 'natural 2', it fails to fire and needs to be reloaded before it can fire again.

If an attack roll made with this weapon is a natural 1, it fails and deals {@damage 1d4} force damage to the wielder. It is then damaged and needs 10 minutes of repair with {@item tinker's tools|PHB}, or use of the {@spell mending} cantrip.
